name: Baldur's Gate 3
title: Baldur's Gate 3
description: A critically acclaimed RPG, offering deep storytelling, tactical combat, and multiplayer co-op gameplay. Set in the Dungeons & Dragons universe, players can explore a vast world filled with choices and consequences.

name: The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom
title: The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom
description: The sequel to the highly successful Breath of the Wild, this action-adventure game continues Link's journey with new abilities and a vast open world full of puzzles, enemies, and secrets.

name: Starfield
title: Starfield
description: Bethesda's first new universe in over 25 years, Starfield is a space exploration RPG set in a vast galaxy. Players can explore planets, customize their ships, and embark on missions in an expansive universe.

name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III
title: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III
description: The latest installment in the Call of Duty series, this game offers intense multiplayer action, a gripping single-player campaign, and refined mechanics that have become the franchise's hallmark.

name: Spider-Man 2
title: Spider-Man 2
description: The highly anticipated sequel to Spider-Man (PS4), this open-world action game allows players to swing through New York City as both Peter Parker and Miles Morales, taking on new villains and challenges.

name: Cyberpunk 2077: Phantom Liberty
title: Cyberpunk 2077: Phantom Liberty
description: The expansion to Cyberpunk 2077, bringing new areas to explore, new storylines, and additional gameplay mechanics. It introduces a new narrative set in a high-stakes world of cybernetic enhancements and corporate intrigue.
